text:
Bow Down To The ‘Real Queen’! Fans Declare Arya Stark As The Ultimate Hero Of Game Of Thrones
Bow Down To The ‘Real Queen’! Fans Declare Arya Stark As The Ultimate Hero Of Game Of Thrones
Spoiler Alert: This article is dark and full of spoilers. If you’re trying to avoid spoilers for Game of Thrones season 8 episode 4, don’t read any further.
via GIPHY
OKAY! So, without further ado, the scene in particular that left all the people across the world watching the epic Battle of Winterfell today stunned was Arya Stark killing the Night King. Yes, the epic and most dangerous villain in the history of television is dead and it is the young Stark girl who made him meet his end.
via GIPHY
In a bid to save Bran Stark, her younger brother, she being the courageous woman that she is, took the chance and stabbed the Night King with the Valyrian steel dagger that Bran had given her.
via GIPHY
And of course, people are shocked, happy, tearful and all emotional right now. They have declared Arya Stark as the real queen and the ultimate hero of Game Of Thrones, and why not! She indeed is! Some of them have jokes and memes too. Take a look at how people reacted to this below.
#1
What do we say to death???
NOT TODAY
Our true queen#AryaStark #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/p1745HulzA — jojojojo (@iwannanina) April 29, 2019
#2
Arya Stark
First of her name
Queen of the Andals and the First Men
Goddess of the Many Faces
Slayer of House Frey
Slayer of the God of Death
Bitchmaker of Cersei Lannister#GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/fH1bH6z5Nf — Ermias Joseph Asghedom (@BoxxJETSon) April 29, 2019
#3
Arya and Bran right after THAT scene...#GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/VrUN0RmU1X — Kenneth Bone (@warhog123) April 29, 2019
Don't Miss 159 SHARES 842 SHARES
#4
- I didn’t know how I kept my pee , Arya Stark is the queen of everything ! #AryaStark #GameofThones ♥️ pic.twitter.com/zb7lBcCZgu — ÄĥMêĐ ÅßƊ Èl ϜãttắĦ (@Abdel_fattah07) April 29, 2019
#5
Excuse me while I bow down to my QUEEN, Arya Stark. #GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/I0qLfnKSXL — Mary Hind ⚾️ (@maryahind) April 29, 2019
#6
No one could kill the night king. No one did. #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/gjthlNtT3a — Ya Girl (@PhancakeMe) April 29, 2019
#7
Who would have thought that this little angel will save the whole World.#GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/R3NXlwrjqc — Zaeem.18 (@18Zaeem) April 29, 2019
#8
Arya casually strolling through the White Walkers to run up behind the Night King #GameOfThrones #BattleOfWinterfell pic.twitter.com/XrXzTVDC2i — Lérd Chigbo ā (@itschigbo) April 29, 2019
#9
Gendry finding out that Arya killed the Night king #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/7cnzEtUh0o — Stev (@StevnUni) April 29, 2019

All hail the real queen!
title: Bow Down To The ‘Real Queen’! Fans Declare Arya Stark As The Ultimate Hero Of Game Of Thrones

Yes, the epic and most dangerous villain in the history of television is dead and it the young Stark girl who made him meet his end.
